item.title: Error System - Simple base
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

a mod won’t delete your topic because you ask for it. you can private message one to ‘clean’ the thread, but not much has actually been said that was wrong in this topic.

sorry you can’t accept the criticism for what you posted.
sure it isn’t hard. sure there are better alternatives. sure you may be a ‘professional’ client developer.

who the hell cares. you posted something in a section that isn’t very active. many people will thank you for this.

regardless of the length of the snippet, or the usefulness of it. please continue to post in this section. perhaps you may spark interest in client development into someone else’s mind and help grow this section again.

Read full topic

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:38, topic:539306”]Once again, this is extremely arrogant because you know for a fact that you are comfortable with the client while others here are not.[/quote]It takes but a day to understand the fundamentals of a client if you can read. Nonetheless, I believe this thread is getting out of hand.

Read full topic

item.title: Error System - Simple base
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

artem543:

3. My opinion is simple. Rewrite the whole client. I rather use my time on the visual aspects of the game than rewriting the server over and over.

Why would you put client development over server development? What the hell are players going to do when they log in? Stare at the pretty sky and re-size their client? They want content, which is why server development is more important. I’m not saying client development isn’t important, I love shit like this; although, to say it’s more important than server development is just dumb.

artem543:

5. If you don’t like my work or progress just ignore it. I haven’t seen something epic from Sinisoul other than some shitty scripts concepts.

I’m pretty sure sinisoul has written lots of frameworks (including the one being used for the official moparscape server…), and I’m also pretty sure he’s released refactored parts of the client that were previously unknown. Also, you don’t know any scripting languages so calling his scripting skills “shitty” is extremely arrogant.

artem543:

6. If you can do better maybe challenge me off on a client project?

Once again, this is extremely arrogant because you know for a fact that you are comfortable with the client while others here are not. It doesn’t make you a better developer. In fact, you’re a shit developer until you realize that you and everything you write sucks.

[quote=“artem543, post:23, topic:539306”]8. This can be improved as this isn’t the final version. But don’t tell me that this is shit and it can’t be used by other people. I do think that this is a great base to start off.

  1. Now back-off you have no constructive feedback to give.[/quote]
    I think the only people that haven’t given you constructive criticism here are sinisoul and asshole_rule. The only criticism that you responded to was the one insulting your ego lol

[quote=“artem543, post:34, topic:539306”][quote author=Vain_ link=topic=658141.msg4403582#msg4403582 date=1391217938]
yeah pb and josh have been around for a long ass time and nobody knows you so I don’t think you’re on the same level as them. especially when you’re releasing little things like this. it’s a few paint methods, that’s it. nothing game changing
[/quote]

I’ve been working myself with Galkon on SoulSplit. You probably don’t know me. That’s all right. Galkon got his reputation on Rune-Server for releasing such small snippets as I am currently. Can you state what has he contributed to the community that is worth called amazing?[/quote]

artem543:

@asshole_rule - Your name truly defines you.

He’s been my good friend for a year or two now and he’s actually a really nice guy.

I agree with Pure_, artem you’re a cool guy and all but your ego is just out of control… you’re like arham4 on steroids.

Read full topic

item.title: Error System - Simple base
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“Pure_, post:35, topic:539306”][quote author=artem543 link=topic=658141.msg4403609#msg4403609 date=1391222298]

yeah pb and josh have been around for a long ass time and nobody knows you so I don’t think you’re on the same level as them. especially when you’re releasing little things like this. it’s a few paint methods, that’s it. nothing game changing

I’ve been working myself with Galkon on SoulSplit. You probably don’t know me. That’s all right. Galkon got his reputation on Rune-Server for releasing such small snippets as I am currently. Can you state what has he contributed to the community that is worth called amazing?
[/quote]The problem is your ego. You modified two methods on the client and are now a self-claimed, and I quote “Professional Client Developper”. Don’t tell me you’re joking because I know you aren’t. Just get off your high-horse and keep doing what you do. If you’re truly good time will tell.

As for your release, it’s ok I guess but as stated before you should have built off Jagex’s system. Thanks for the contribution regardless.[/quote]Got to agree with this.

Read full topic

yeah pb and josh have been around for a long ass time and nobody knows you so I don’t think you’re on the same level as them. especially when you’re releasing little things like this. it’s a few paint methods, that’s it. nothing game changing
[/quote]

I’ve been working myself with Galkon on SoulSplit. You probably don’t know me. That’s all right. Galkon got his reputation on Rune-Server for releasing such small snippets as I am currently. Can you state what has he contributed to the community that is worth called amazing?[/quote]The problem is your ego. You modified two methods on the client and are now a self-claimed, and I quote “Professional Client Developper”. Don’t tell me you’re joking because I know you aren’t. Just get off your high-horse and keep doing what you do. If you’re truly good time will tell.

As for your release, it’s ok I guess but as stated before you should have built off Jagex’s system. Thanks for the contribution regardless.

item.title: Error System - Simple base
item.dc:creator: @artem543 artem543
item.description:
@artem543 wrote:

It’s funny how a simple snippet can drive people to such arguments.

  1. I could just not release this. But, I decided to released due the fact that I thought that this might be something usefull to someone else.

  2. Yes, RuneScape is perfect game. Everything was tested by thousands players. Will you use it? It depends. However, you don’t have to argue people of what they should rewrite and what not.

  3. My opinion is simple. Rewrite the whole client. I rather use my time on the visual aspects of the game than rewriting the server over and over.

  4. I am not a Java, Ruby, PHP, Python Guru. I am on a learning stage. However, I am on the same level as Galkon, PB900 and other greatest RSPS client developers.

  5. If you don’t like my work or progress just ignore it. I haven’t seen something epic from Sinisoul other than some shitty scripts concepts.

  6. If you can do better maybe challenge me off on a client project?

  7. This is my way of doing it is more user-friendly and secure than Jagex 2006 version.

  8. This can be improved as this isn’t the final version. But don’t tell me that this is shit and it can’t be used by other people. I do think that this is a great base to start off.

  9. Now back-off you have no constructive feedback to give.

@asshole_rule - Your name truly defines you.

Read full topic
